changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE teacher( teacher_id int GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY PRIMARY KEY, fio varchar NOT NULL , academic_degree int REFERENCES academic_degree(id) ON DELETE SET NULL , working_rate double precision NOT NULL check ( working_rate > 0 ), image_file_name varchar, max_work_hours double precision check ( max_work_hours > 0 ), actual_working_hours double precision check ( actual_working_hours >= 0 ) );
